newsitem.title: USA: M-I Drilling sells Anchor's U.S. assets.
newsitem.headline: M-I Drilling sells Anchor's U.S. assets.

text.p: M-I Drilling Fluids LLC said privately-owned Jordan Drilling Fluids Inc has acquired the U.S. assets of Anchor Drilling Fluids AS following Department of Justice approval.

M-I Drilling Fluids, owned 64 percent by Smith International Inc and 36 percent by Halliburton Co, acquired Anchor Drilling Fluids from Transocean ASA June 11 subject to terms of a Divestiture Agreement. Under that agreement, Anchor's U.S. were to be held separate for sale to a purchaser on terms acceptable to the Department of Justice.
M-I said Jordan Drilling Fluids intends to change its name to Anchor Drilling Fluids USA Inc.
